original_text: He had a little scroll open in his hand. And he set his right foot on the sea, and his left foot on the land,
korean_text: 그 손에는 펴 놓인 작은 두루마리를 들고 그 오른 발은 바다를 밟고 왼 발은 땅을 밟고

sentences.original_text: He had a little scroll open in his hand.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 손에 펼쳐진 작은 두루마리를 들고 있었더라.

sentences.original_text: And he set his right foot on the sea,
and his left foot on the land,
